speech: From what I know my name is Ava Ire.
Oh sorry, I thought you knew. My name is Ava.
I go by Avaire, but you can call me Ava.
People use to call me their god, now i'm simply known as AvaIre.
Well I really wanted to be called Lara, but my master decided on AvaIre.
Ii introduced myself when i came into this server. Your bad with names aren't you?
